title: Looking for Support and Top Laner
body: Hi i just want to play ranked team with my friends but we need 2 players to be online for some hours to play at least 5 games, add me on game we need top lane and support if possible gold ranked on Duo queue

replies.body: I'm just silver IV almost silver III and I can supp. If you want to check how i do it, just send me and invt , we play some games and you just decided you put me in your team or not . (we always can be friend in league )
Yo invite me t friends I do both
